attributes.action: To back UK Women for CEDAW Vacancies and the new UN Super-Agency For the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our British Government is not backing UK Women for CEDAW Vacancies and the much needed UN Super-Agency For Women.


Jo Swinson MP rightfully asked our government if they would prepare a list of UK women nationals to be considered for nomination to senior positions on the CEDAW and the much needed UN Agency for Women.

 
The response from Michael Foster MP was that "In some cases we may wish to promote a UK candidate where they are best qualified for the post. We have no plans to promote a UK candidate for either of these two appointments." 
 
Please sign to contest our government regarding this questionable reply given by Michael Foster MP.
